definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: In this paper, the technical features of the structure of the Bridge are briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍粤海铁路栈桥的结构技术特点。

sentences.english: The initiation mechanism of electro-explosive device( EED) was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了射频对电火工品的作用机制。

sentences.english: The article describes the structural features and configuration of the edger stand with whole hydraulic screw-down for HCM Rough mills.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍全液压压下立辊轧机的结构特点及组成。

sentences.english: This is the brief summary about the recent study progress on the secretion proteins of Mycobacteria .
sentences.chinese: 对近年来分支杆菌分泌蛋白研究进展进行了简要综述。

sentences.english: On the utilization of creative study in marketing;
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍世界各国研究和应用创造学的概况。

sentences.english: Follow this up with a succinct description of the location followed by a dash and a time reference.
sentences.chinese: 接着，简要地说明地点，然后用一个破折号提及时间。

sentences.english: The mechanism of reducing aerodynamic drag by acoustic excitation was briefly analysed.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先简要地分析了声激励减阻机理。

sentences.english: At the same time, it is described how to treat the denitrified residua.
sentences.chinese: 同时还简要介绍了脱氮残渣的处理方法。

sentences.english: The physical mechanism of leaky-wave on microstrip line is briefly introduced at the beginning of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先简要介绍了微带线漏波的物理机制。

sentences.english: This article has a brief review on Holocene climate changes in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 简要地回顾了蒙古全新世气候变化研究。

sentences.english: Finally, an economic evaluation of the reclaimed-water recycling plant is made.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对该中水处理系统做了简要的经济评估。

sentences.english: This paper briefly analyzed the development of Liaoning coastal economic belt.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要就辽宁沿海经济带的发展进行了简要的分析。

sentences.english: In this paper we reviewed the recent progress in proteomic study of hepatocellular carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 本文就肝细胞癌的蛋白质组学研究进展作简要综述。

sentences.english: It describes 4 deep-sky surveys since the discovering of Schmidt optics.
sentences.chinese: 简要地介绍了十二种著名的巡天星图。

sentences.english: The functions realized by the system and the software flow charts are described simply.
sentences.chinese: 系统所实现的功能及软件流程文中也作了简要说明。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter narrated the books design's future.
sentences.chinese: 第五章简要概叙书籍装帧的未来发展战略。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
